biotools.summary: Gene modeling server which focuses on the modeling of alternative splicing. It is based on the alignment of mRNA, EST and protein sequences and combines genome-based clustering and transcript assembly.  Supports human, mouse and rat genomes.

bioschemas.name: ASmodeler
